item.title: MIUI V12.0.1.0.RJCCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi 9 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 9 China

Codename: lancelot

Version: V12.0.1.0.RJCCNXM | 11.0

Size: 3.5 GB

MD5: 37a823c18debf0b6d49d894f1b5a545b

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to May 2021. Increased system security.
Stable MIUI based on Android 11
[Xiaomi Cloud]
New: Location info can be now reported automatically before the device is powered off
[Status bar, Notification shade]
GPS toggle renames as "Location"
